SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.application.controller

Class AddEntryToDoListController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.application.controller.AddEntryToDoListController
public class AddEntryToDoListController extends Object
The AddEntryToDoListController class handles the logic for adding entries to the to-do list. It interacts with various repositories to manage tasks, employees, green spaces, and authentication.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an AddEntryToDoListController object and initializes the repositories.

    • getGreenSpaces

      public List<GreenSpace> getGreenSpaces(String userEmail)
      Retrieves a list of green spaces managed by the user with the specified email.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - the email of the user
      Returns:
      a list of green spaces managed by the user

    • filterGreenSpacesByManager

      public List<GreenSpace> filterGreenSpacesByManager(List<GreenSpace> greenSpaces, String managerName)
      Filters a list of green spaces based on the provided manager name. This method iterates through the green spaces and checks if their manager name (case-insensitively) matches the provided name. Matching green spaces are added to a new list and returned.
      Parameters:
      greenSpaces - The list of GreenSpace objects to filter.
      managerName - The name of the manager to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of GreenSpace objects managed by the specified manager (empty list if no matches are found).

    • getTaskUrgencies

      public TaskUrgency[] getTaskUrgencies()
      Retrieves all available task urgencies.
      Returns:
      an array of TaskUrgency values

    • createTask

      public Optional<Task> createTask(GreenSpace selectedGreenSpace, String taskTitle, String taskDescr, TaskUrgency taskUrgency, int expectedDuration)
      Creates a new task with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      selectedGreenSpace - the green space associated with the task
      taskTitle - the title of the task
      taskDescr - the description of the task
      taskUrgency - the urgency level of the task
      expectedDuration - the expected duration of the task in hours
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the created task if successful, empty otherwise

    • getUserEmail

      public String getUserEmail()
      Retrieves the email of the current user.
      Returns:
      the email of the current user, or null if an error occurs
